name: Last Protection
description:
The barbarians are trying to enslave your kingdom, stop them!
Build towers that will fire at the enemy. Also, the towers have their own unique features, which should be used wisely.
Use additional skills to keep the enemy out of your castle.
Mining the paths that enemies follow, use slowing down to make it difficult for the enemy, use the explosion to destroy crowds of enemies.
Can you fight off the hordes of barbarians who destroy everything in their path?


Features:
-Difficult gameplay
-Many enemies
- Towers with unique features
-Additional skills: mines, slowdown, explosion
